title: At last, Z beats A. TDC2 2005
content:
If you’re around NYC during late July, take this in:

[**TDC51 and TDC2 2005 Exhibitions**](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.tdc.org/events/2005events/2005tdc51cooperunion.html)

Venue :  
The Cooper Union  
Arthur A. Houghton, Jr. Gallery  
7 East 7th Street (at Third Avenue)  
New York City

Exhibition Dates and Times:  
The exhibition will be on display from Friday 15 July through Thursday 28 July  
The gallery will be open Monday–Friday 9–6pm  
Closed Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.
author: Norbert Florendo

comments.content:
I wonder when TDC2 winners will be announced? Prelims were posted in Feb, and several vendors have been bragging about thier wins, but still no official list of winners?

Cheers, Si
I have been dreaming about the day when Z beats A, I’m so there. :)

Si, see.? :)  
_\> [www.tdc.org/news/2005Results/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.tdc.org/news/2005Results/index.html)_

_( Woohoo, for ‘ [Absara](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=Absara)’, ‘ [Auto](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=auto&id2=overview)’, ‘ [Bello’,](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=bello&id2=overview) [The ‘Ed’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150) and all the others.. :)_

Gee… I want the [“Life-like Benguiat Statuette”](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111102049/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=150) from House Industries. It looks like the head is separate, so maybe it nods?

——————————————————————————————————————  
Yes, I’m old, but I’m not available as a bobble-head, yet!
Where’s his cigar? It’s not lifelike without the cigar.

\>Si, see.? :)

Thanks Dav, not sure how I missed it - probably was looking for it at the top of the news list.

Cheers, Si

Some very good work there (Now I see why I lost :-)

ChrisL
